text:
Hi-

I'm getting the following exception after putting batik.jar under lib directory 
in the WEB-INF together with the struts/commons jars. If removing it I don't 
get the exception but the problem is that I need this jar file for other parts 
of my application.Aug 31 15:03:17 2004: Servlet jspservlet: unable to service 
request: Cannot find ActionMappings or ActionFormBeans collection

ActionMappings or ActionFormBeans collection

text:
I don't really see how we could be part of the problem.
There is no batik code anywhere in the stack trace.
My first suspicion would be that you somehow corrupted the
classpath when adding batik.

Sorry I can't be more help...
No response.  Reopen if you have more info.
creator: deweese@apache.org
